title: I will professional modern minimalist business card design
about:
This is Sarkar. Looking for a professional and visually appealing business card that will leave a lasting impression on your clients and customers? Look no further!

With 5 years of graphic design experience, I can create a high-quality business card design that leaves a lasting impression. I work closely with you to choose colors, fonts, logo, and contact information, ensuring the final design meets your expectations.

Don't settle for a generic business card design; let me help you create a unique and professional design that will help you make a great first impression. Take a look at my Fiverr gig today to begin your project!

My services include:

  • Double sided business card
  • Editable source files.
  • High-resolution file format.
  • Perfection revisions.
  • Friendly communication.

Requirements:

  • Logo Files in AI/EPS/PDF/PNG/JPG Format. (Note: The gig does not include logo design, so please contact me for the price)
  • Name and Job Title.
  • Phone Number and Email.
  • Website and address.
  • Additional information for card design.
  • Include additional information.

You have any questions, feel free to send me a message.

Thank You So much

sarkar_nayan
experience: With 5 years of graphic design experience, I can create a high-quality business card design that leaves a lasting impression.
